name: Sushi Dou
description:
Welcome to Sushi Dou!

https://sushi_dou.4everland.app/

To play the game you have jump to 4everland since we use NEAR protocol and Itch has a strict iframe policy.

The theme "raw" reminded us of Sushi so we decided to make a game of it.

The rule is simple. Customers order various kinds of sushi and sometimes a combo of sashimi. All orders need 2 ingredients.
You have to choose the right ingredients and serve the right food by the time customers leave.

Use cursor keys to control a player, and a space key to choose a food and serve customers.(you have move to right in front of them to choose or serve)

You get a score for each serve if you got the right order and you can increase the score by serving faster.

Try to get as much score as you can in 30 seconds!

If you have a NEAR account, you can login via the game and save the high score in your wallet.

Once you save the high score in your wallet, the game will get it from the network and always display it in the score screen even if you reload or leave the page.

You can also play as a guest user, but you'll lose the high score if you leave or reload the page.

Some assets in this project are loaded from IPFS gateway.
